snippet.title: Glorious Companions - First Official Gameplay with Developer Commentary
snippet.description:
Add the game to your Steam wishlist: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1001040/Glorious_Companions/

Enjoy the first 10 minutes of gameplay from our mercenary management game - Glorious Companions.

Glorious Companions is a singleplayer 3D turn-based tactical RPG set in an original dark fantasy world of Navaroth where the player crafts their own journey as a leader of a mercenary company. The game’s core fundamental value lies in the freedom that it gives to the players: aspire to become a powerful lord, solve the mystery of the Ancient Guardians or just ride around the continent building your fortune on trade.
